basics.name: Alex Thompson
basics.label: Digital Marketing Manager
basics.summary: Results-driven digital marketing professional with 5+ years of experience developing and executing data-driven marketing strategies. Proven track record of increasing brand awareness, driving customer acquisition, and optimizing ROI across multiple channels.

work.name: GrowthTech Inc
work.summary: Leading digital marketing strategy and execution for B2B SaaS company.
highlights: Increased organic traffic by 250% through SEO optimization and content strategy
Managed $500K annual marketing budget across paid channels (Google Ads, LinkedIn, Facebook)
Improved conversion rate from 2% to 5.5% through landing page optimization and A/B testing
Grew email subscriber list from 15K to 75K in 18 months
Led team of 3 marketing specialists and collaborated with sales team on lead generation

work.name: BrandWorks Agency
work.summary: Managed digital marketing campaigns for diverse client portfolio.
highlights: Executed social media campaigns reaching 2M+ users and achieving 8% engagement rate
Created content marketing strategy increasing client's organic leads by 180%
Managed Google Ads campaigns with average ROAS of 4.5x
Developed email marketing campaigns with 35% open rate (15% above industry average)
Analyzed campaign performance using Google Analytics and provided actionable insights

work.name: StartupCo
work.summary: Supported marketing team with campaign execution and content creation.
highlights: Managed company blog, publishing 3-4 articles weekly
Coordinated social media posting across multiple platforms
Assisted in organizing 5 successful webinar events with 500+ attendees each

volunteer.summary: Mentoring aspiring marketers and career changers.
highlights: Reviewed portfolios and provided career guidance
Hosted workshops on digital marketing fundamentals

publications.name: The Future of B2B Marketing: AI and Personalization
publications.summary: Exploring how artificial intelligence is transforming B2B marketing strategies and customer experiences.
